title: Rehabilitation of Priority Roads with Financial Assistance from Local Banks
decision_details:
- Cabinet approval has already been granted for the rehabilitation and improvements to the following sections of roads with financial assistance from local Banks.  The proposal made by H.E. the President, in his capacity as the Minister of Finance and Planning, to authorize the Road Development Authority  to enter into loan agreements with the relevant local Banks, was approved by the Cabinet: 

*	Wattala - Mahara Road (B460)(0-7.24 km);

*	Ambalangoda - Elpitiya - Pitigala Road 
	(B14) (16.23 km - 29.36 km );

*	Madawachchiya - Horowpathana Road 
	(B282) (0.00km - 10.00 km); and

*	Hendala - Hunupitiya Road (B151) (0.00km. - 4.02 km).
